title: Sub-Inspector Habib Ullah laid to rest with full police honours
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 04 (APP):Funeral prayer of Sub-Inspector Habib Ullah, who passed away while serving in the Islamabad Traffic Police, was offered at the Police Lines Headquarters on Wednesday.
A public relations officer told APP that the Inspector General of Police (IGP) Islamabad Syed Ali Nasir Rizvi, senior officers, and a large number of personnel attended the funeral prayer and paid tribute to the deceased officer.
IGP Rizvi laid a floral wreath, offered Fateha, and expressed heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family. He praised the late Sub-Inspectorâ€™s dedication to duty and stated that his services would always be remembered.
The body was later sent to his native town for burial with full official honours, and police officers accompanied the body as a mark of respect.
IG Rizvi directed senior police officials to ensure every possible support for the family of the deceased, reiterating that all members of the police force are valuable assets, and their families will be looked after with utmost care.
